about_the_game:
"The collapse of Gensokyo... it was you, Reimu - "

『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』is a Touhou Project officially approved derivative rhythm action game.
Two modes are available: the Story Mode, in which you can solve the mysteries of the destroyed Gensokyo through the Danmaku Kagura (rhythm game), and the Free Mode, in which you can play the rhythm game to your heart's content.

Enjoy a total of 171 songs, including 68 songs from the main product and 103 additional songs distributed as four DLCs.

Game Experiences

Kagura Stage
In this mode you hit the notes at the right moment!
You can stack up combos and get a high score by hitting the notes consecutively coming through the 6 lanes.



Danmaku Stage
A totally new game experience that combines Danmaku shoot 'em up & Rhythm games!
Complete missions set for each stages and beat the stage!



Customizability to tune your rhythm experience
Change the notes' speed, adjust the location of the combo display,
change the notes' design, change all you want to give you a stress-free rhythm experience.

Characters

Featuring over 80 characters from Touhou Project. Characters are animated with Live2D.





Beautiful illustrations to color your game
Over 300 Mitama cards available to obtain through the progression of the game.
Amazing artists such as Yuu Kamiya (No Game No Life), Negi Haruba (The Quintessential Quintuplets), and many more have contributed to producing the fantastic works!


The only game where you can play Touhou Project Original Songs


Alongside many songs from the Touhou Project games, songs such as
"U.N. Owen Was Hero?" by Toby Fox & ZUN were written for this game! Accessible from free DLC.

Touhou Project Originals included in the base game
  • 幽霊楽団　～ Phantom Ensemble (Phantom Band ~ Phantom Ensemble)
  • ハルトマンの妖怪少女 (Hartmann's Youkai Girl)
  • ボーダーオブライフ (Border of Life)
  • U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか？ (U.N. Owen Was Her?)
  • 紅楼　～ Eastern Dream… (Crimson Belvedere ~ Eastern Dream…)
  • 月まで届け、不死の煙 (Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke)
  • ピュアヒューリーズ　～ 心の在処 (Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart)

Touhou Project Originals included in DLCs
Additional Song Pack Vol.1
  • 恋色マスタースパーク (Love-colored Master Spark)

Additional Song Pack Vol.2
  • 千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon (Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon)

Additional Song Pack Vol.3
  • 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟 (The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak)

Additional Song Pack Vol.4
  • 亡き王女の為のセプテット (Septette for a Dead Princess)

Free DLC
  • U.N. Owen Was Hero？
